languages.text: С сего момента мир принадлежит лишь Вольному Торговцу. Ваши люди изничтожили поселения, в которых скрывались нечистые последователи богомерзкого культа. Скверна Короля Искажений ослабила хватку, и земли Амберворлда смогли вздохнуть спокойно — благодаря стараниям свое{mf|го|й} ново{mf|го|й} правител{mf|я|ьницы}. Однако зловещие отголоски прежних слуг Архиврага все так же таятся в тенях и ждут подходящего момента, чтобы снова окутать планету паутиной ереси. Зло не проходит бесследно.

traits.locale_text: С сего момента мир принадлежит лишь Вольному Торговцу. Ваши люди изничтожили поселения, в которых скрывались нечистые последователи богомерзкого культа. Скверна Короля Изменений ослабила хватку, и земли Амберворлда смогли вздохнуть спокойно — благодаря стараниям свое{mf|го|ей} ново{mf|го|й} правител{mf|я|ьницы}. Однако зловещие отголоски прежних слуг Архиврага все так же таятся в тенях и ждут подходящего момента, чтобы снова окутать планету паутиной ереси. Зло не проходит бесследно.

languages.text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.
languages.original_text: С сего момента мир принадлежит лишь Вольному Торговцу. Ваши люди изничтожили поселения, в которых скрывались нечистые последователи богомерзкого культа. Скверна Короля Искажений ослабила хватку, и земли Амберворлда смогли вздохнуть спокойно — благодаря стараниям свое{mf|го|й} ново{mf|го|й} правител{mf|я|ьницы}. Однако зловещие отголоски прежних слуг Архиврага все так же таятся в тенях и ждут подходящего момента, чтобы снова окутать планету паутиной ереси. Зло не проходит бесследно.

traits.locale_text: From that moment the world belong to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements housing the unclean followers of the profane cult, the corruption instilled by King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows and wait for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not go away without a trace.

Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows and wait for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not go away without a trace.

From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

languages.text: 从那一刻起，这个世界便只属于行商浪人本人。你的船员铲除了定居点的房屋与亵渎的邪教徒，扭曲之王的腐化松开了它的魔爪。得益于新任统治者的不懈努力，琥珀世界的众多庄园如今终于可以送一口气了。然而，混沌大敌不怀好意的仆从仍然潜伏在阴影之中，静候时机到来，准备将这颗行星再次包裹进异端的罗网之中。邪恶永远都不会彻底消失。
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

traits.locale_text: 从那一刻起，这个世界便只属于行商浪人本人。你的船员铲除了定居点的房屋与亵渎的邪教徒，扭曲之王的腐化松开了它的魔爪。得益于新任统治者的不屑努力，琥珀世界的众多庄园如今终于可以送一口气了。然而，混沌大敌不怀好意的仆从仍然潜伏在阴影之中，静候时机到来，准备将这颗行星再次包裹进异端的罗网之中。邪恶永远都不会彻底消失。

languages.text: その瞬間から、惑星はローグトレーダーだけのものとなった。民は、入植地の住居と不敬な魔女団の不浄な信者を根絶やしにした。ディストーションの王によって植え付けられた腐敗はその支配力を緩め、アンバーワールドの領地は新しい支配者の努力のおかげで安堵のため息をついた。しかし、渾沌の勢力の悪意に満ちた手下たちは、いまだ影に潜み、惑星を異端の網で包むタイミングを待っている。悪は跡形もなく消えるわけではないのだ。
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

traits.locale_text: その瞬間から、惑星はローグトレーダーだけのものとなった。民は、入植地の住居と不敬な魔女団の不浄な信者を根絶やしにした。ディストーションの王によって植え付けられた腐敗はその支配力を緩め、アンバーワールドの領地は新しい支配者の努力のおかげで安堵のため息をついた。しかし、渾沌の勢力の悪意に満ちた手下たちは、いまだ影に潜み、惑星を異端の網で包むタイミングを待っている。悪は跡形もなく消えるわけではないのだ。

languages.text: A partir de ese momento, el mundo perteneció únicamente {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Tu gente arrasa las viviendas de los asentamientos y erradica a los impuros seguidores del culto profano. La corrupción instaurada por el rey de la Distorsión afloja sus garras, y la gente Ámbar respira aliviada gracias a los esfuerzos de su nuevo gobernante. Sin embargo, los maliciosos siervos del Archienemigo aún acechan en las sombras, esperando el momento oportuno para envolver el planeta en una red de herejía. El mal nunca desaparece sin dejar rastro.
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

traits.locale_text: A partir de ese momento, el mundo perteneció únicamente {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Tu gente arrasa las viviendas de los asentamientos y erradica a los impuros seguidores del culto profano. La corrupción instaurada por el rey de la Distorsión afloja sus garras, y la gente Ámbar respira aliviada gracias a los esfuerzos de su nuevo gobernante. Sin embargo, los maliciosos siervos del Archienemigo aún acechan en las sombras, esperando el momento oportuno para envolver el planeta en una red de herejía. El mal nunca desaparece sin dejar rastro.

languages.text: Von diesem Augenblick an gehörte die Welt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} allein. Deine Leute löschten die Häusler in den Siedlungen aus und die unreinen Anhänger des profanen Kults. Die Verderbnis, die der König der Entstellung über den Planeten gebracht hatte, löste ihre Umklammerung. Die Anwesen auf Amberworld können erleichtert aufatmen, dank der Bemühungen {mf|ihres neuen Herrschers|ihrer neuen Herrscherin}. Doch böse Diener des Erzfeinds lauern noch immer in den Schatten und warten nur auf den richtigen Augenblick, um den Planeten in ein Netz der Ketzerei zu verwickeln. Das Böse verschwindet nicht einfach spurlos.
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Von diesem Augenblick an gehörte die Welt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} allein. Die Verderbnis, die der König der Entstellung über den Planeten gebracht hatte, löste ihre Umklammerung. Die Anwesen auf Amberworld können erleichtert aufatmen, dank der Bemühungen {mf|ihres neuen Herrschers|ihrer neuen Herrscherin}. Doch böse Diener des Erzfeinds lauern noch immer in den Schatten und warten nur auf den richtigen Augenblick, um den Planeten in ein Netz der Ketzerei zu verwickeln. Das Böse verschwindet nicht einfach spurlos.

languages.text: À compter de cet instant, ce monde n'appartient plus qu'{mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Vos gens se lancent dans une campagne d'éradication des disciples impurs de ce culte profane. Délivré de la corruption instillée par le Roi de la Distorsion, Ambremonde doit sa renaissance aux efforts de {mf|son nouveau souverain|sa nouvelle souveraine}. Cependant, les serviteurs malveillants du Grand Ennemi rôdent toujours dans les ombres, guettant le bon moment pour tisser leur toile d'hérésie autour de la planète. C'est bien connu, le mal a la vie dure.
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.

languages.text: Şu andan itibaren bu dünya, yalnızca Hür Tacir'e ait. Adamların, bu günahkâr tarikatın aşağılık müritlerinin ve yerleşimlerini ortadan kaldırmaya girişiyor. Bozunum Kralı'nın aşıladığı yolsuzluğun etkisini yitirmesiyle Kehribardünya, yeni hükümdarının boyunduruğu altında rahat bir nefes alıyor. Gelgelelim Şerbaşı'nın melun hizmetkârları, gölgelerde saklanmaya ve gezegende kâfirlik ağlarını yeniden örmek için fırsat kollamaya koyuluyor. Kötülük kolay yitmez.
languages.original_text: From that moment the world belonged to the Rogue Trader alone. Your people eradicated the settlements' housing and the unclean followers of the profane cult. The corruption instilled by the King of Distortion loosened its grip, and the estates of Amberworld can breathe a sigh of relief thanks to the efforts of their new ruler. Yet malicious servants of the Archenemy still lurk in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to wrap the planet in a web of heresy. Evil does not simply disappear without a trace.
